Kako je Zvezda postala žrtva sopstvenih visokih standarda
Pre desetak godina svaki navijač crveno-belih bi pristao na ulazak u Ligu šampiona, sve i da njegov tim izgubi šest puta sa po 10:0 u grupi. Ali apetiti su porasli, lestvice pomerene, a Zvezda nema igrače koji bi mogali da opravdaju takva očekivanja
07 Nov 2019 by Darjan Nedeljković
BEOGRAD 2009. GODINE: „Samo bar jednom da uđemo u Ligu šampiona, da osetimo kako je tamo igrati. Neka nas svi tamo pune, ali svi bismo bili srećni. Samo da da vidimo mušemu i da ovde dolaze velikani“.BEOGRAD 2019. GODINE: „Ovo više ne može da se gleda. Nismo konkurentni, najbolje bi bilo da siđemo u Ligu Evrope, pa da igramo neki fudbal. Samo se sramotimo“.
Promena razmišljanja navijača Crvene zvezde na uzorku od jedne decenije, tokom koje su samo poslednje tri godine bile upečatljive, predstavlja najveću moguću pobedu Milojevićeve i ere aktuelnog rukovodstva. Još od dana kada su crveno-beli izbacili Salcburg, zatim za 12 meseci i Jang Bojs, znalo se da vrlo lako mogu da postanu žrtve sopstvenih visokih standarda. Jer su dobrim manevrima uspeli da zaduže ključeve unapređenog juga i dobiju priliku da se na savršenom autoputu trkaju, kako je to Milojević rekao na zvaničnoj konferenciji za medije, sa ferarijem. Ne, ovog puta nećemo o razlici u budžetu, finansijskoj i fizičkoj nadmoći Totenhema, ponovoljenoj u beogradskom duelu. Tu činjenicu ljudi s Marakane su znali i pre nego što je obavljen žreb za ovogidšnju Ligu šampiona.
Nedostatak energije, neka ravna linija na stadionu Crvene zvezde posle prvog gola Totenhema, koji se graniči s jezivom ravnodušnoću, najbolji je dokaz da će navijači i igrači crveno-belih u bliskoj budućnosti (ako budu igrali Ligu šampiona) biti protagonisti svojevrsnog sportskog „survajvera“. Varaju se oni koji misle da je Crvena zvezda za 180 minuta protiv Totenhema naučila sve lekcije. Školovanje će biti dugo, ukazuju nam to i primeri drugih klubova iz regiona, i frustrirajuće. Problem je samo što je srpski šampion jeftino dozvolio Sonu, Kejnu i Ndombeleu da sednu za katedru i drže predavanja. Biće na ovom nivo takmičenja i Liverpula, ali biće i mnogo više Totenhema. Pa ko ima hrabrosti da gleda te prizore biće i dalje na Marakani. To je taj bolni proces koji ne može da bude završen posle samo dve sezone u takmičenju s alama.



Da je Pavkov dao gol pri rezultatu 0:0 možda bi sve bilo drugačije, realno je da bi se utakmica okrenula naglavačke. Zvezda je pre 365 dana dala gol Liverpulu iz prve šanse, zatim ga dokosurila iz druge. Takvi mečevi se dešavaju… Ali se ne ponaavljaju tako često. Međutim, rolerkoster sudbine Milana Pavkova, njegovi golovi i propuštene prilike, jedina su nit koja povezuje 6. novembar prošle i ove godine.
Zvezda je protiv Liverpula igrala s mnogo više energije. Sada ni na stadionu, ni na terenu, nije bilo vulkana emocija, niti potrebne strasti da bi se srušio tim kao što je Totenhem.
Zvezda je u pomenutom meču s kasnijim šampionima Evrope bila zategnuta kao „struna“, savršeno tatički postavljena, dozvolivši Liverpulu da iz igre promaši samo jednu stopostotnu priliku. Onu Staridžovu iz 12. minuta. Ostalo što je napravila ekipa Jigena Klopa bila je posledica jalove inicijative. Zvezda je imala tada neku nevidljivu hemiju, niti koje su povezivale ceo tim, savršeno stajala, i nije moglo da joj se desi da se raspadne kao u drugom poluvremenu susreta sa Sparsima i posluži kao tim za bildovanje samopouzdanja. Možda ima i do toga što Zvezda u startnoj postavi u sredu veče nije imala nijednog igrača poniklog u svojoj školi. Grupa Gardista je pri kraju mandata, kažu, skrenula u dekadenciju, ali je znala da emocijom, tu pre svih mislimo na Vujadina Savića i Žuleta Stojkovića, popravi krvnu sliku ekipe. Sad to može samo Milan Borjan.



Posebna je tema što je tada Crvena zvezda bila tim s jasno podeljenim ulogama. Znalo se da je, pored Marina, gazda veznog reda Nenad Krstičić. Ne znači da bi prisustvo bivšeg reprezentativca Srbije bilo toliko delotvorno da bi poništilo klasu Ndombelea, ali bi se bar znalo od koga možeš šta da očekuješ. Zvezda – a to je već standardna tema – više nema izgrađene tandeme. Sve je na pola. Špancu Kanjasu nedostaje fizičke snage, Petrović je neiskusan, Vulić u blagoj ekspanziji, ali nedovoljno potvrđen, Jovančić u kandžama velike krize. Sigurni smo da u Ljutice Bogdana ne znaju kome će u budućnosti moći bezgranično da veruju. Isti slučaj je i s napadačima jer Crvena zvezda u ovom trenutku nema prvog špica. Niti će ga imati do kraja jesenje sezone. To je osnovna greška sportskog sektora i uprave Crvene zvezde.
Sve te anomalije Crvena zvezda je jednom morala da plati. I onda se desila promašena šansa Pavkova. I onda se desila dominacija Totenhema.
Ali može da se desi i bod u Pireju. I novo evropsko proleće. I to bi bio fantastičan uspeh, i prilika za Zvezdu da u Ligi Evrope, u sudaru s nekim sebi približnijim, ponovi razgali navijače. Timovi poput Totenhema su jednostavno nedodirljivi. I još dugo će svaki eventualni susret s takvima boleti.



(FOTO: Reuters, Star Sport)

How the Star fell victim to its own high standards
Ten years ago, every red and white fan would agree to join the Champions League, losing his team six times with 10-0 in the group. But appetites have increased, the ladder has shifted, and Star has no players that can live up to such expectations
07 Nov 2019 by Darjan Nedeljkovic
BELGRADE 2009: “Only once to enter the Champions League, to feel what it's like to play there. May we all be filled there, but we would all be happy. Let's just see the fly and the giants come here. "BELGRADE 2019:" This can no longer be viewed. We are not competitive, it would be best to go to the Europa League and play some football. We are just ashamed. "
Changing the mindset of Red Star fans in a one-decade pattern, during which only the last three years have been striking, represents the greatest possible victory for Milojevic and the current leadership era. Ever since the Red and Whites kicked Salzburg, then in 12 months and Young Boys, it was known that they could easily fall prey to their own high standards. Because by good maneuvers they were able to borrow the keys of the advanced south and get the opportunity to race on the perfect highway, as Milojevic said at an official press conference, with a Ferrari. No, this time we are not going to talk about the difference in budget, financial and physical superiority of Tottenham, repeated in the Belgrade duel. This fact was known by the people of Marakana even before the draw for this year's Champions League was done.
Lack of energy, some straight line at the Red Star Stadium after Tottenham's first goal, bordering on creepy indifference, is the best proof that fans and players of the red and white will be the protagonists of a sort of sports "surviver" in the near future (if they play Champions League) . Those who think the Red Star learned all the lessons in 180 minutes against the Tottenham are deceiving. The schooling will be long, examples from other clubs in the region show, and frustrating. The only problem is that the Serbian champion cheaply allowed Son, Kane and Ndombele to sit in the chair and give lectures. There will be competition at this level and Liverpool, but there will also be a lot more Tottenham. So whoever has the courage to watch those scenes will still be in Marakana. It is this painful process that cannot be completed after only two seasons in the alley competition.



If Pavkov had scored a goal at 0-0 it might have been different, it is realistic that the match would have turned upside down. The star gave Liverpool a goal at the first opportunity 365 days ago, then finished it from the second. Such matches happen ... But they don't happen as often. However, the rollercoaster of Milan Pavkov's fate, his goals and missed opportunities, are the only thread connecting November 6 last year and this year.
The star played with Liverpool with much more energy. Now, neither in the stadium nor in the field, there was a volcano of emotions, nor the passion needed to bring down a team like Tottenham.
The star was tightened up in the aforementioned match with the subsequent European champions as a "string", perfectly poised, allowing Liverpool to miss just one hundred percent chance from the game. That Staridge from the 12th minute. The rest made by Jigen Klop's team was the result of a futile initiative. The star had some invisible chemistry at the time, and the threads that connected the whole team stood perfectly, and she couldn't break up like in the second half meeting the Spars and serve as a confidence-building team. It may also be that Zvezda did not have a single player in his starting lineup on Wednesday night at his school. At the end of their tenure, the Guards group turned to decadence, but they knew that by emotion, first of all, we mean Vujadin Savic and Zulet Stojkovic, to improve the blood picture of the team. Only Milan Borjan can do it now.



A special theme is that Red Star was a team with clearly divided roles at the time. In addition to Marin, it was known that Nenad Krsticic is the boss of the midfielder. It does not mean that the presence of the former Serbian national team player would be so effective as to invalidate Ndombele's class, but at least one would know from whom you can expect anything. The star - which is already a standard theme - no longer has tandem built. It's all in half. The Kanjas Spaniard lacks physical strength; Petrovic is inexperienced; We are sure that the Goddesses of Bogdan do not know who in the future they will be able to trust without limit. The same is the case with the strikers, as the Red Star does not have a first point guard at the moment. Neither will have it by the end of the fall season. This is a fundamental mistake of the Red Star sports sector and administration.
All these anomalies the Red Star once had to pay. And then Pavkov's missed chance happened. And then Tottenham's domination happened.
But there may also be a point in Piraeus. And a new European spring. And that would be a fantastic success, and an opportunity for the Star to reignite the fans in the Europa League, in a collision with some closer ones. Teams like Tottenham are simply untouchable. And for a long time any eventual encounter with such will hurt.
